# blendMode

**Instance Property**

The blend mode used to draw the sprite into the parent’s framebuffer.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var blendMode: SKBlendMode { get set }
```

```swift
var blendMode: SKBlendMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.spritekit/documentation/SpriteKit/SKBlendMode/alpha].

## Configuring Alpha Blendling

- **Blending a Sprite with Different Interpretations of Alpha**: Reinterpret a sprite’s alpha property to react differently to the objects below it.
- **SKBlendMode**: The modes that describe how the source and destination pixel colors are used to calculate the new destination color.
